name: Khuzani
description: '''Khuzani Nkosikhona Innocent Mpungose''' (born December 3, 1989), professionally known as '''Khuzani or khuba'''  is a South African singerand a businessman. Born and raised in Nkandla, [[KwaZulu Natal]], he rose to prominence after participating in Mgqumeni's posthumous 2010 album ''iSecret''.
